remarks: Justification theorem for the ordered pair definition in Norbert Wiener, "A simplification of the logic of relations," _Proc. of the Cambridge Philos.  Soc_., 1914, vol. 17, pp.387-390.  It is also shown as a definition in [Enderton] p. 36 and as Exercise 4.8(b) of [Mendelson] p. 230.  It is meaningful only for classes that exist as sets (i.e. are not proper classes).  See ~ df-op for other ordered pair definitions. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2003.)
